zoisia.gloss: lawn grasses native to southeastern Asia and New Zealand

zone.gloss: any of the regions of the surface of the Earth loosely divided according to latitude or longitude

zonotrichia albicollis.gloss: common North American finch with a white patch on the throat and black-and-white striped crown

zoo.gloss: the facility where wild animals are housed for exhibition

zooerastia.gloss: sexual activity between a person and an animal

zooerasty.gloss: sexual activity between a person and an animal

zooflagellate.gloss: flagellate protozoan lacking photosynthesis and other plant-like characteristics

zoological garden.gloss: the facility where wild animals are housed for exhibition

zoological science.gloss: the branch of biology that studies animals

zoologist.gloss: a specialist in the branch of biology dealing with animals

zoology.gloss: all the animal life in a particular region or period

zoom.gloss: the act of rising upward into the air

zoom lens.gloss: a camera lens that magnifies the image

zoomastigina.gloss: in some classifications considered a phylum of the kingdom Protista

zoomastigote.gloss: flagellate protozoan lacking photosynthesis and other plant-like characteristics

zoonosis.gloss: an animal disease that can be transmitted to humans

zoonotic disease.gloss: an animal disease that can be transmitted to humans

zootoxin.gloss: a toxin resembling bacterial toxins in its antigenic properties that is found in the fluids of certain animals

zori.gloss: a sandal attached to the foot by a thong over the toes

zoroaster.gloss: Persian prophet who founded Zoroastrianism (circa 628-551 BC)

zoroastrianism.gloss: system of religion founded in Persia in the 6th century BC by Zoroaster

zoster.gloss: eruptions along a nerve path often accompanied by severe neuralgia

zostera.gloss: (or in some classifications family Zosteraceae) small genus of widely distributed marine plants

zosteraceae.gloss: used in some classifications: essentially equivalent to Potamogetonaceae

zoysia matrella.gloss: lawn grass common in the Philippines

zoftig.gloss: (of a female body) healthily plump and vigorous
